name: FIAP!? (Frog In A Plane!?)
description:
FROG IN A PLANE

Please use a keyboard and mouse , controller functionality was scrapped.

The goal of the game is to get the highest score possible, upgrades and coins carry over between runs on purpose!

(most upgrade screens are not finished, if you read this please leave feedback on how you feel about the bullet upgrade screen.)

CONTROLS:

PLEASE FULLSCREEN

ARROW KEYS TO MOVE

SPACE TO SHOOT

A TO CHANGE WEAPON
